channel.title: [tut]how to make alot of peep come to your server[tut]
channel.description:
1.first make ur server source narb scape or somewhere that dosent deal with varrok.im sayintg that because some peep get bored of being at varrok always
2.ur source has to have shops spreaded out(alot of peep hate shops close together)
3.alot of ppl use hamachi so its a good idea to use that
4.make a cool name for u and ur private server for example if it was sarscape it wouldnt make the reader go on the topic cause name is not good but if it was bloodyscape itll atract the reader to go on it
5.make a advertisment topic on server advertise section and make it good with tones of picks of shops and maybe update and even places and players
6.try posting on different forums so ull have more ppl
~blade arrow5
